ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".mt-4 .mb-10 ul li"),
  data = [];
list == 0
  ? java.log("ğŸ¨çƒ­é—¨éŸ©æ¼«ğŸ’ï¼šæœç´¢å¤±æ•ˆï¼Œè¯·ä¿®å¤")
  : ""
for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
  data.push({
    name: list[i].select(".my-4.text-white").text(),
    author: "",
    kind: "",
    word: "",
    latest: "",
    intro: "",
    cover: list[i].select("a img").attr("src"),
    url: list[i].select(".text-white").attr("href")
  });
}
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
$[:10]

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements("li.w-full a"),
  data = [];
list == 0
  ? java.log("ğŸ¨çƒ­é—¨éŸ©æ¼«ğŸ’ï¼šç›®å½•å¤±æ•ˆï¼Œè¯·ä¿®å¤")
  : ""
date = String(java.getElements('[class="text-[#B7B7B7]"]').text()).replace(/æœ€è¿‘æ›´æ–°ï¼š|\s/g, "");
for (i in list) {
  data.push({
    title:
      i == 0 ? `[${list.length}]Â·${list[i].text()}ã€”${date}ã€•` : list[i].text(),
    link: list[i].attr("href")
  });
};
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

    intro: "",
    cover: String(list[i].select("img").attr("data-original")).replace(/http:/, "https:"),
    url: list[i].select("a").attr("href")
  });
}
result = JSON.stringify(data);

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
Date.prototype.Format = function (fmt) {
  var o= {
    "M+": this.getMonth() + 1, //æœˆä»½ 
    "d+": this.getDate(), //æ—¥ 
    "H+": this.getHours(), //å°æ—¶ 
    "m+": this.getMinutes(), //åˆ† 
    "s+": this.getSeconds(), //ç§’ 
    "q+": Math.floor((this.getMonth() + 3) / 3), //å­£åº¦ 
    "S": this.getMilliseconds() //æ¯«ç§’ 
  };
  if (/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (this.getFullYear() + "").substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length));
  for (var k in o)
  if (new RegExp("(" + k + ")").test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (RegExp.$1.length == 1) ? (o[k]) : (("00" + o[k]).substr(("" + o[k]).length)));
  return fmt;
};
date = new Date(new Date().getTime()).Format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".detail-list-1 li a"),
  data = [];
for (i in list) {
  data.push({
    title:
      i == list.length - 1 ? `${list[i].text()}ã€”${date}ã€•` : list[i].text(),
    link: list[i].attr("href")
  });
};
1 == flag
  ? (java.put("Enable", 1), JSON.stringify(data))
  : java.toast("\nâ—æœªå¯ç”¨ä¹¦æºâ—");
</js>
